# The `WithColor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An RAII object that temporarily switches an output stream to a specific color. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::WithColor</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An RAII object that temporarily switches an output stream to a specific color.

Definition at line 54 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/withcolor-h">WithColor.h</a>.

### WithColor() {#a0b7d62735f94b418859340f4949299bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>WithColor::WithColor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343">HighlightColor</a> S, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2">ColorMode</a> Mode=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a06b9281e396db002010bde1de57262eb">ColorMode::Auto</a>)</>}>
To be used like this: WithColor(OS, HighlightColor::String) &lt;&lt; &quot;text&quot;;.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">The output stream</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="S">Symbolic name for syntax element to color</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Mode">Enable, disable or compute whether to use colors.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

### WithColor() {#a49d88ad31bfdaa61d47dd7720c083823}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVM&#95;CTOR&#95;NODISCARD llvm::WithColor::WithColor (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a1d5efc43dd5669473ac2fe47d5aaf965">raw&#95;ostream::Colors</a> Color=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad55e55b3692fe8ec3e8b724d3d5bade0">raw&#95;ostream::SAVEDCOLOR</a>, bool Bold=false, bool BG=false, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2">ColorMode</a> Mode=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2a06b9281e396db002010bde1de57262eb">ColorMode::Auto</a>)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
To be used like this: WithColor(OS, raw&#95;ostream::BLACK) &lt;&lt; &quot;text&quot;;.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">The output stream</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Color">ANSI color to use, the special SAVEDCOLOR can be used to change only the bold attribute, and keep colors untouched</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Bold">Bold/brighter text, default false</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="BG">If true, change the background, default: change foreground</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Mode">Enable, disable or compute whether to use colors.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
